body:
Okay so before I left the server, I had made a comic on Avicus defending do's and dont's but I did not finish this comic and had the idea of doing more but completely forgot and the idea fell off the face of the earth!

NOT: This comic is NOT complete and won't be completed.

better quality on the link:

https://Pixton.com/ic:zkpephfj
